Database - Class in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db
Represents a running database instance.
There can only be one instance running at any given time.

Default constructor.

DataCollector - Class in com.wolvencraft.yasp
Stores collected statistical data until it can be processed and sent to the database.
This class is intended to be run in an asynchronous thread; all components are thread-safe.
DataCollector() - Constructor for class com.wolvencraft.yasp.DataCollector
Default constructor.
Initializes an empty list of LocalSessions
DataStore - Interface in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync
Common interface for all data stores
DataStore.DetailedData - Interface in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync
Represents data stored in a log format.
DataStore.NormalData - Interface in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync
Represents the "totals" of statistical data.
DeathListener - Class in com.wolvencraft.yasp.listeners
Listens to any entity deaths on the server and reports them to the plugin
DeathListener(Statistics) - Constructor for class com.wolvencraft.yasp.listeners.DeathListener
Default constructor
Creates a new instance of the Listener and registers it with the PluginManager
deaths() - Method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.LocalSession
Returns the data store that contains information about miscellaneous player deaths.
Does not include PVP or PVE.
DeathsData - Class in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync
Data collector that records all item statistics on the server for a specific player.
DeathsData(int) - Constructor for class com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.DeathsData
Default constructor
Creates an empty data store to save the statistics until database synchronization.
DeathsData.DetailedDeathEntry - Class in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync
Represents an entry in the Detailed data store.
DeathsData.DetailedDeathEntry(Location, EntityDamageEvent.DamageCause) - Constructor for class com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.DeathsData.DetailedDeathEntry
Default constructor
Creates a new DetailedDeathPlayersEntry based on the data provided
DeathsData.TotalDeathsEntry - Class in com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync
Represents the total number of times a player died of a particular cause.
Each entry must have a unique player and a unique death cause.
DeathsData.TotalDeathsEntry(int, EntityDamageEvent.DamageCause) - Constructor for class com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.DeathsData.TotalDeathsEntry
 
debug(String) - Static method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.util.Message
Sends a message into the server log if debug is enabled in the configuration.
Should not be used if there is more then one line to be sent to the console.
debug(Level, String) - Static method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.util.Message
Sends a message into the server log if debug is enabled in the configuration.
Should not be used if there is more then one line to be sent to the console.

deleteFile() - Method in class com.wolvencraft.yasp.util.StatsSignFactory.StatsSign
Deletes the sign data file.
